name: Take Over!
description:
An alien landed on Earth and tries to capture it!

Unable to survive in earth's conditions, he survives by taking over electric toys.
His first stop to world domination begins in a room of a mad baby, who sends his endless army of toys to eliminate you!

Controls: Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys Fire - Right mouse button / E Switch Toy - Left mouse button / Q * You may switch toys by hovering the over the target with your HUD.

Credits:

Michal Laufer , Aviv Zvulun
